item.title: Build VIM 8.2 from source
item.description: VIM 8.2 安装 1. Install Python3.9 from source Update the packages list and install the packages necessary to build Python 1 sudo apt update && sudo apt install build-essential zlib1g-dev libncurses5-dev libgdbm-dev libnss3-dev libssl-dev libreadline-dev libffi-dev libsqlite3-dev wget libbz2-dev Download the latest release’s source code from the Python download page using wget 1 wegt https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.9.0/Python-3.9.1.tgz Switch to the Python source directory and execute the configure script which performs a number of checks to make sure all of the dependencies on your system are present
